rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective from the specified list.
The segment contains explicit low-risk framing ('No human cases') and food safety assurance ('remains safe'), which are not Q2 Alarmist cues.
The segment uses a plain verb ('detected') with negation and provides a food safety assurance ('remains safe to eat'), which are Neutral/Q5 cues, not Q3.
